title: [Large-scale] Intensive Course on Worked Examples-Based Video Podcasts for Pre-Calculus Learning

context.prior_knowledge: High school mathematics fundamentals (functions, equations, graph comprehension)
context.additional_context: Offline classes optimized for smartphone-based video learning environments. Providing real-time feedback through formative assessment.

learning_goals: Learners can solve worked examples of five foundational calculus problem types (limits, continuity, differentiation, integration, applications) with 80% accuracy
Learners can reconstruct and explain complex mathematical concepts into three or more stages using step-by-step video podcast explanations
Learners solve and submit context-specific problems from formative assessments within 15 minutes via smartphones

resources: Calculus Task Example Video Podcast (59 Episodes)
Printed Learning Materials with QR Codes
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
